description: You shouldn't be here. How did you do it? Actually just go back to the valley.
North town entrance to the valley. To the south lies the village.
Northwest corner of town. Shops potentially to north, northwest, and west of here.
North town section. North leads to the valley, west and east are roads around the town, south to the central fountain.
Northeast corner of town. Locations potentially to the north, northeast, and east of here.
West side of town. A large locked gate blocks the road westward. You're not sure what lies that way, but you can't find a way there anyway.

Before you stands a tall fountain. The faded and stained stone carries a certain aura that looms over you. It doesn't give off a vileness, however the mystery of how the water flows and why it has never stopped is ignored by the locals.'
East side of town. The path is open to the east, but something compells you to not go that way.
Southeast corner of town. Potential locations to the east, southeast, and south of here.
South entrance of the town. A path to the south is blocked by a fallen tree and you don't want to step over it.
Southwest corner of town. Potential locations to the south, southwest, and west.
North east show for testing limited entrances.
